articles.title: Tata commences deliveries of the Tiago EV in India - Team-BHP
articles.description: Tata Motors has announced that dealerships across India have started deliveries of the Tiago EV. The first batch of 2,000 cars has been handed over to customers across 133 cities.
articles.content:
Tata Motors has announced that dealerships across India have started deliveries of the Tiago EV. The first batch of 2,000 cars has been handed over to customers across 133 cities.

articles.title: Tata Altroz and Punch CNG to be launched in India by June 2023 - CarWale
articles.description: The CNG versions of the Altroz and Punch were showcased at the Auto Expo 2023. Both models get twin cylinders to store CNG.
